evidence.claim: Abernathy Home Care utilizes AWS services for cloud infrastructure including Lambda and S3 for scalable applications.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations to ensure the confidentiality of patient data.
Integration with Health Level 7 (HL7) is implemented for health record sharing.
The use of X12 transaction sets is supported to facilitate electronic data interchange.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 EDI transactions and integrates with health systems, indicating a focus on healthcare data exchange.
